name: Rooms Demo
description:
Rooms Demo:

"It is a stormy night and you find yourself in what appears to be an old dilapidated Room.  The Room's walls are creaking as if the very walls are alive, shapes shift from the corner of your eye, you must remain calm.  You know not why or how you have ended up in these Rooms but one thing is for certain, you must uncover the riddles to find the answer and escape!"

This is a short Horror demo and my FIRST EVER GAME made in UE4 with HorrorEngine as a template.  I really hope you enjoy and please do feel free to give constructive feedback on my demo!  Let me know if I scared you ;)

Note:  This game demo is free and is more for my own learning and progression with game design.  I used free assets from the UE4 store and feature Kopiko - Madre
